DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety , pharmacokinetics effect BIBR 1048 MS coagulation parameter healthy volunteer subject .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Safety , Pharmacokinetics Effect BIBR 1048 MS Coagulation Parameters Healthy Volunteer Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject determine result screen Signed write informed consent accordance GCP local legislation Age ≥ 18 ≤ 50 year Broca ≥ 20 % ≤ + 20 % Any finding medical examination ( include blood pressure , pulse rate electrocardiogram ( ECG ) ) deviate normal clinical relevance History current gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immunologic , hormonal disorder History orthostatic hypotension , faint spell blackouts Diseases central nervous system ( epilepsy ) psychiatric disorder Chronic relevant acute infection History allergy/hypersensitivity ( include drug allergy ) deem relevant trial judge investigator History bleed disorder include prolonged habitual bleeding History hematologic disease History cerebral bleeding ( e.g . car accident ) History commotio cerebri Intake drug longlife ( > 24 hour ) within 1 month prior administration Use drug might influence result trial within 10 day prior administration trial Participation another trial investigational drug within 2 month prior administration trial Smoker ( > 10 cigarette 3 cigar 3 pipes/day ) inability refrain smoke study day Alcohol abuse ( > 60g/day ) Drug abuse Blood donation within 1 month prior administration trial Excessive physical activity within 5 day prior administration trial Any laboratory value outside clinically accept reference range History familiar bleed disorder Thrombocytes < 150000/µl
